text: Gran Hermano VIP 8 is the seventh season of the reality television Gran Hermano VIP series. The season is set to be launched in September 2019 on Telecinco. Jorge Javier Vazquez will be the host of the show and Jordi Gonzalez has been confirmed to be back as the host of the weekly Debate. == Housemates == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left; line- height:17px; width:auto;" |- ! Adara, Antonio David, Diego, Mila and Noemí were chosen. * : The HoH won the power to save one of the nominees. * : The HoHs won the right to nominate in the diary room and also the power to save a nominated housemate. Adara and Antonio David didn't agree to save a housemate and the nominees remained the same. * : Nuria was forced to leave the house due to medical reasons. * : The HoH won the power to save one of the nominees and replace him/her with another housemate. * : As a new housemate, Pol was exempt from nominations. * : The HoHs won the power to save one of the nominees but they didn't use it. * : Due to the weekly task, there were two teams, Red team (Alba, Diego, Gianmarco, Noemí and Pol) and White team (Adara, Antonio David, Estela, Joao and Mila). The Red team won a challenge and they had the privilege to split 6 points as they pleased. * : On this round, Joao won the privilege to give one extra point; Antonio David, to give two extra points and Estela, to split 6 points as she pleased. * : The public voted among the evicted housemates and the 3 with most votes entered on Day 47. Diego, Hugo and Kiko received the most votes to re-enter. * : Hugo was exempt from nominations as he returned to the house as an official housemate. * : The HoH won the power to nominate automatically a housemate, Estela nominated Hugo. * : Lines were opened to vote to save. The housemate with fewest votes would be evicted. * : Lines were opened to vote for the winner. ==Nominations total received== {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%; text-align:center; font- size:85%; line-height:12px;" ! style="width:5%" | ! style="width:5%" | Week 1 ! style="width:5%" | Week 2 ! style="width:5%" | Week 3 ! style="width:5%" | Week 4 ! style="width:5%" | Week 5 ! style="width:5%" | Week 6 ! style="width:5%" | Week 7 ! style="width:5%" | Week 8 ! style="width:5%" | Week 9 ! style="width:5%" | Week 10 ! style="width:5%" | Week 11 ! style="width:5%" | Week 12 ! style="width:5%" | Week 13 ! style="width:5%" | Final ! style="width:5%" | Total |- ! rowspan=3|14 | bgcolor="lightgreen"|50.2% | 37.4% | 12.4% | bgcolor="grey" colspan=2| |- | bgcolor="lightgreen"|48.6% | 40.1% | 11.3% | bgcolor="grey" colspan=2| |- | bgcolor="lightgreen"|56.1% | 43.9% | bgcolor="grey" colspan=3| |} == Repechage == Anabel, Nuria, Hugo, Dinio, Kiko, Irene and Diego would face an online voting that will decide which 3 of them will return to the house as candidates to officially become as official housemates. The repechage was officially announced on Day 44 (October 24, 2019). The 3 most voted housemates entered the house on Day 47, Kiko was the housemate with fewest votes on Day 49 and Hugo was the most voted and became an official housemate on Day 51, therefore Diego was re-evicted. {| class=wikitable |- !
